SELECT EMPLOYEE_ID, FIRST_NAME||' '||LAST_NAME name, EMAIL, TO_CHAR( HIRE_DATE ,'yyyy-mm-dd' ) hire_date, SALARY, DEPARTMENT_NAME, JOB_TITLE FROM EMPLOYEES E LEFT OUTER JOIN DEPARTMENTS D ON E.DEPARTMENT_ID = D.DEPARTMENT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN JOBS J ON E.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID WHERE 1=1
AND UPPER(E.FIRST_NAME || E.LAST_NAME) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{keyword}) ||'%' OR UPPER(J.JOB_TITLE) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{keyword}) ||'%' OR UPPER(D.DEPARTMENT_NAME) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{keyword}) ||'%'
AND UPPER(E.FIRST_NAME || E.LAST_NAME) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{keyword}) ||'%'
AND UPPER(${option}) LIKE '%'|| UPPER(#{keyword}) ||'%'
ORDER BY E.EMPLOYEE_ID ASC
